title: El Malpais National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases       Tourism to El Malpais and El Morro National Monuments creates Economic Benefits to the local economy  A new National Park Service (NPS) report shows that in 2014, 164,063 visitors to El Malpais National Monument spent 9.2 million dollars in communities near the park.  Download the news release  Â     Sorry, there are no news items currently listed.
